data.name: Arcade Dungeon Demo
data.detailed_description:
Arcade Dungeon is an exciting variety game where 1-4 players can enjoy tons of arcade inspired mini-games together online or locally.

ONLINE, LOCAL MULTIPLAYER

By connecting a game controller, up to 4 people can play together on one computer. You can also play online if your friends are far away. Local play and online play can be applied at the same time!

DUNGEON MODE

1-4 players explore arcade dungeons. Play mini-games to defeat the arcade machines that stand in your way. What awaits at the end of the dungeon?

MINIGAMES

Play mini-games inspired by classic arcades. You will be able to clear the mini-game if you use your various abilities.

ENDLESS MODE

Do you want to dig into just one game? it's okay. Choose the game of your choice in Endless mode and try to achieve the highest score. * Endless mode only supports Local Play.

CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION

By clearing the dungeon and collecting arcade coins, you can decorate your character with various costumes.

SINGLE PLAYER

Everyone wants to be alone sometimes. it's okay. All mini-games and game modes support single-player.


So, How about we explore the arcade dungeon?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
